text: Arrā ga yogen-sha-tachi to yakusoku sa reta toki o omoe. (Kare wa ōse rareta). `Ware wa Keisuke to eichi to o anata gata ni sazukeru. Sonogo de, anata gata ga motsu (Keisuke) o jisshō suru tame, hitori no shito ga anata gata no tokoro ni kurudearou. (Sonotoki) anata gata wa kare o shinji, kare o tasuke nasai.' Kare wa ōse rareta. `Anata gata wa kore o shōchi suru ka. Ko no koto ni tsuite, wareto katai yakusoku o suru ka' kare-ra wa mōshiageta,`shōchishimashita'`sorenara anata gata wa shōgen shi nasai. Ware mo anata gata to tomoni risshō shiyou.' To ōse rareta
